questions.question: Let’s start off with our house dean! Ms. Oxenford. Which one of these is the truth?

choices.answer: Has lived in 17 different homes across two countries
Has obtained 4 citizenships, including one in France
Used to be friends with Justin Trudeau in high school
Had to evacuate her apartment due to 24 snakes being found in the building

questions.question: Now onto Ms. Quinn! (Instep Mentor). Which is the true fact?

choices.answer: She has been brutally attacked - pecked - by a penguin
Had a student whose family was involved in the mafia
Went to visit the Lenin statue in Antartica
She used to be an underground artist in 2013

questions.question: Next up is Ms. Wilson! (Instep Mentor) Which fact is true?

choices.answer: Had lunch and dinner with former PM Kevin Rudd
Was almost an unofficial informal member of the royal family
Has taught princesses and a prince
Was involved in a documentary about Australian teachers

questions.question: Last and not least, Mr. Chen! Which fact is true?

choices.answer: Accidentally invented the electric Hurdy Gurdy
Used to be a basketball prodigy
Used to be involved in heavy research of the Egyptian sun god, Horus
His best subject in high school was music

questions.question: Now the captains and ambassadors! Let’s start with our 1st ambassador: Amelia!

choices.answer: Almost had her last name as her first due to a computer error
Had to go to the hospital because her appendix exploded
Accidentally gave herself food poisoning by eating a month old burrito
Was involved in a local production of Hamilton

questions.question: Another one of our Year 11 ambassadors, Nick! Which fact is true?

choices.answer: A roller hockey fanatic, represented Australia in one of many competitions
Almost received a concussion from a stray baseball
Is the founder of niche philosophy club in Yugoslavia
Cleopatra is one of his common ancestors

questions.question: And our final Year 11 ambassador, Aleisha! Which fact is true?

choices.answer: Accidentally ended up in the background of a Bear Grylls show
Nearly caused a rockslide while camping
Forgot to bring tent poles for the tent during camping, ended up in a hotel
Managed to jump off a 200m high cliff into water without injury

questions.question: Onto the Junior Ambassadors! Which is the true fact for Andrea?

choices.answer: Has had one of her calligraphy pieces shown on television
Has 550-600 pens for calligraphy
Totally not a fan of calligraphy
Has won a national calligraphy contest

questions.question: Let’s introduce another Junior ambassador, Jessica! Which fact is true?

choices.answer: Was able to escape America right before Corona invaded the planet.
Was able to visit North Korea but nearly got kicked out
Has lived in Fiji for 5 years
Has lived in the Russia for 3 years

questions.question: What about our our Art Senior Captain that resides in Franklin? What is true about her?

choices.answer: Is able to play 10 songs by memory, all of them are anime openings.
Is able to play the Hurdy Gurdy, a guitar with one string and a tuba
Is able to play the violin, the lesser violin (viola), and the cello
Is able to play the flute, violin and piano.

questions.question: Lets move on to our Sports Captain, Alejandro! Which is true for him?

choices.answer: Has seen Guns n’ Roses live on stage
Was a representative for a national European handball team
sports
Has beaten Guns n’ Roses in a European handball match

questions.question: How about one of the Prouction Captains? Which is Eton’s true fact?

choices.answer: Was the source of the ball that nearly concussed Nick
Has broken every single limb in his body
Has broken a baseball with his bare hands
Met the voice of Buzz Lightyear, asked him if he voiced Lightning McQueen

questions.question: What about one of the Production Ambassadors? Which is the true fact about Jonathan Basari?

choices.answer: Was involved in a Menulog Ad with Snoop Dogg
Almost kidnapped 50 frogs as his pets
Has his own group of magpies he takes care of.
Punched me (Fox) by accident during an escape room

questions.question: Which is a true fact for Mason? (A senior environmental ambassador)

choices.answer: Got scared of his own reflection during an escape room
Is 12 years old (in theory)
One of his distinct uncles was Michael Jackson
Used to live in South Africa for a year

questions.question: And of course, which is a true fact for our Junior House Captain?

choices.answer: Never went to the Eiffel Tower
Hugged a stranger at the bottom of the Eiffel Tower
Hugged the Eiffel Tower
Hugged a stranger at the top of Eiffel Tower

questions.question: Lastly, what is the true fact about me? (Fox, Your senior house captain)

choices.answer: I am the creator of a popular WiP choose your own adventure book.
I helped made a fursuit that was used in the hit show: Lucifer
I was a concept artist within the development of Zootopia
I used to be a writer for a popular podcast: Nightvale

questions.question: Final 4 Questions! Which scientist is our house based on?

choices.answer: Benjamin Franklin
Rosalind Franklin
Franklin the Turtle
Franklin Rosalind

questions.question: Rosalind Franklin was well known for her DNA research, but what else was she known for?

choices.answer: Contributions to early renewable energy
Contributions towards X-Ray efficiency
Researching the structure of Coal and Viruses
Genetics and the editing of genetics

questions.question: Rosalind Franklin would have been nominated for more than one Nobel Prize other than her work on DNA

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Will Franklin win next year?

choices.answer: Definitely
Probably
yeah
FRANKLIIIIIIN WOOOOOOO
